0A4H.L.short_name: STONECO LTD STONECO ORD SHS CLA
0A4H.L.summary: StoneCo Ltd. provides financial technology solutions to merchants and integrated partners to conduct electronic commerce across in-store, online, and mobile channels in Brazil. It distributes its solutions, principally through proprietary Stone Hubs, which offer hyper-local sales and services; and technology and solutions to digital merchants through sales and technical personnel and software vendors, as well as sells solutions to brick-and-mortar and digital merchants through sales team. As of December 31, 2020, the company served approximately 652,600 clients primarily small-and-medium-sized businesses; and 260 integrated partners, such as global payment service providers, digital marketplaces, and integrated software vendors. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in George Town, Cayman Islands. StoneCo Ltd. is a subsidiary of HR Holdings, LLC.

4991.TWO.summary: GCS Holdings, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures compound semiconductor wafer and foundry related services in China, the United States, Taiwan, and internationally. It also manufactures and sells optoelectronics technology products and optical chips, as well as grants royalty rights for intellectual property. In addition, the company develops, manufactures, and sells mobile phone radio frequency, filter, optical communication chip, power management, and optical fiber products, as well as positive, intrinsic, negative components, and avalanche photo diodes for telecommunication systems and data communication networks; and engages in manufacturing, retailing, and wholesaling telecommunication devices and electronic components. Further, it provides product design, outsourcing management, and research development services. The company serves wireless devices and fiber-optic communication providers. GCS Holdings, Inc. was founded in 1997 and is based in George Town, the Cayman Islands.

AIQ.L.summary: AIQ Limited focuses on social commerce businesses comprising social media platforms. It primarily focuses on seeking opportunities in data mining, artificial intelligence technologies, and social and online media, such as instant messaging platforms, as well as in the e-commerce sector. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.
